name: Pokémon Consonancia
summary: Pokémon Consonance, inspired by Pokémon Masters, is a game in which you will travel to Passio as a novice trainer, there you will meet different characters from all the official releases together, from Kanto to Paldea, as well as characters brought by the Masters, such as Professor Margarita, You will participate in the WPM, a high level tournament that seeks to determine the strongest trainer of all, to achieve this task, you must improve as a trainer, but also, you must recruit different characters for your team, some of them will do it by history but many of them will depend on a RNG factor: The gachapon mode. It won't be easy to be the best, so testing strategies and team combinations will be fundamental!

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: New Pokemon Game With All Starters, Exp Share, Mega Evolution, Gacha Mode, New Story & More! [RPGXP]
